main.public_title: Comparison of the curative efficacy and safety of allo-HSCT by using conditioning regiment of modified BUCY or CLAG combined with modified BUCY for refractory and relapsed patients with acute myelocytic leukemia: a sigle-center prospective randomized controlled clinical trial
main.scientific_title: Comparison of the curative efficacy and safety of allo-HSCT by using conditioning regiment of modified BUCY or CLAG combined with modified BUCY for refractory and relapsed patients with acute myelocytic leukemia: a sigle-center prospective randomized controlled clinical trial
main.hc_freetext: Relapse and Refractory Acute Myelocytic Leukemia
main.i_freetext: Control Group:Modified BUCY;Experimental Group:GLAG combined with BUCY;

primary_outcome.prim_outcome: Overal Survival (3 years);Leukemia Free Survival (3 years);Recovery of platelet;

secondary_outcome.sec_outcome: Complete Remission (28 days after transplantation);Toxicity of the conditioning regimens;Recovery of neutrocyte ;Donor chimerism;Transplantation-realted mortality(1,2 and 3 year(s) after transplantation respectively);Relapse Rate;Cronic&Aute GVHD (rate & severity);Infection rate;

source_support.source_name: Beijing Municipal Science and Technology Commission
